reviews.review: What I like about Portal 2 is all of the puzzles and characters, and the CO-OP mode.
Mira bro, este juego es buenardo. Si no lo jugas es que sos alto pussy.
Игра  скучна. но если у вас есть друг , то игра открывается новыми красками
Best Solo Game!, I normally only play online games but this had a really nice campaign
In my top ten favorite games of all time.
I wish i could portal my friends out of existence.
Short but powerful... just like my d-

Portal 2, sequel to Portal 1, is an amazing thrill-filled puzzle solving game that should be played by all gamers. I personally loved this game because it hits all the criteria for the ideal game. I definitely recommend this game. The best bang-for-your-buck deal is the portal bundle witch includes both games.
melhor jogo pra se jogar com o seu amiguinho burro
A masterpiece in every sense of the word. Just play it.
понравилось всё но тем кто не любит головоломки не советую

Perfeito! As mecânicas são muito bem usadas, de forma que não fica repetitivo. O enredo é muito bom, com personagens muito carismáticos, um jogo muito bacana e em diversos momentos muito engraçado. Portal 1 e 2 têm um lugar especial no meu coração. Super recomendado.
The perfect sequel to the original
关卡设计独特，有好友联机非常有意思。
Good game. I like this game because it is good.

belo jogo
só não recomendo para quem não tiver paciencia
i feel that i'm going to spent like 300 hours with the community test chambers
ein etwas längeres und knackig puzzle spiel mit einer noch geileren story
If you havent bought the game when its 90%. Then your the biggest fool. This is a really fun puzzle game whit a cool story.
extremamente divertido principalmente se jogado com amigos
amazing game, you NEED to play it with friends. when you shoot the portal in the wrong direction and kill your partner to when you throw the cube away they will always hate you.
Top otimo jogo para gastar um bom tempo boa jogabilidade
Si te gusto portal 1 te encantara portal 2
Fun, challenging, and entertaining. Flexes your brain while having a good time.

Одна из лучших головоломок на мой взгляд. Периодически (раз в несколько лет) возвращаюсь к этой игре. Бывает просто ностальгия накатывает, а бывает просто хочется в авторских комнатах позалипать или своё что то сообразить.
Melhor jogo de puzzle com um pouco de ação, isso pq eu nem gosto de jogo de puzzle. Contém uma ótima história.

How can I pay everything back that this game has done for me and taught me, wait I will start from the begining. 
 I got this game as a present from my brother a few years ago when i was really young. I played it so much. I told all my friends about how of a good game it is. I learned so many life lessons from this. I cant recommend this more then anything. I think this is THE best game on steam. Multiplayer is so fun, I love playing it with my friends, If your thinking about getting it, do it. This game has done so much to me and changed who I am. Best thing I can do to repay this game is to recommend this to everyone. Valve, Thank you, for changing my life.
super divertido para jogar com um amigo
Portal 1 and 2 are fun puzzle games that require creative problem solving. Overall, this game is very fun and has a great story.
最高。エンディングんとき背筋がぞくぞくっと
Amazing Intuitive Game Even Many Many Years After Release, Unmatched
Атмосфера супер - я её ещё в 3D очках проходил

o jogo é mt bom, pica pra caralho e eu recomendo 
recomendado
Puzzle solving and cooperative and also fun.
Leave it to steam to revolutionize genres. As if the first one wasn't enough, they had to go and make the perfect sequel. Don't hold your breath for no 3 though.
因为好玩，因为怀旧，因为还有人玩。
One of the best coops out there
pretty fun, would recommend to black mesa
me gusta porque es un juego muy interesante y divertido y se lo recomiendo a todos, los puzles son muy interesantes y algunos muy dificiles pero en general es muy recomendable
Como esses puzzles encantam a gente. Delicinha de jogo
I loved this game, and the original. I recently gifted this to a friend of mine and look forward to hearing from her about how she liked it. And plan on playing multiplayer with her asap!
Потрясающая головоломка, которая не заставит скучать вас и вашего друга. Помимо проявления смекалки, также можно и повеселится.
